body: @FSS lmao kys, Magifuro beats everybody in this anthology doujin no contest, chinzurena wasn't at  his best in here, his panels and drawing seem kinda lifeless and repetitive compared to his other stuff, also @ACreepyCrepe what the hell are ya talking about my fellow crepe, the art here is decent and Magifuro's part looks sexy af loool, but yeah 6/10 doujin cuz mosiac censorship but Magifuro gets an 8/10.
5/10, I can only fap to good art
Someone have the firts in english?
